name: Arctic Fleet
description: The Arctic doesn’t forgive your mistakes. You need to come up with a good strategy to make the business successful. It sounds hard; however, it is not that easy to scary you, and you accept the challenge, don’t you?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 570 MB available space
